website_summaries.verdict: A fresh design and easy way to customize your unique pill-taking schedule.
pros: A simple way to organize pills for everyday use, but perhaps not dementia or other serious illnesses
Opens easily with a lid that pops-up
Deep compartments hold all types of pills
Customers note the quality of construction and for a great price
cons: Overall one of the few complaints was lack of color options

customer_reviews.title: IMPROVED!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed to organize my meds. But it is set up a little clunky and I like to be as organized as possible. So, I removed the PM tray and turned it around so I could read all of the tabs from the same side. Then I removed the PM tabs and reattached them in Sun - Sat order. Now I have a more functional, organized pill tray. : )
customer_reviews.author: JAY S.

customer_reviews.title: Simple device with terrible design.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good idea but terrible execution. The night time compartments are set up in the usual order, left to right from Sunday through Saturday. But the morning compartments are set up right to left. It is thoroughly confusing and entirely counter intuitive. Look for something that is at least somewhat user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: PhilosopherKing

customer_reviews.title: Works with my routine
customer_reviews.text: I like the push-button latches. AM/PM organization works well for my meds. Large capacity is great. I have a bit of trouble getting small pills out of the compartments. Dumping pills out is a bit awkward. After using this organizer for a short time, I have to lower my original rating by one star. Why? Because the printed labels on the compartments are wearing off rapidly simply by contact with fingers.
customer_reviews.author: H. L. B.

customer_reviews.title: I’m 26 and addicted to this pillbox
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this is probably the best pillbox I've come across. I’m super picky when it comes to stuff like this and I have no complaints. You can rearrange the days easy with the removable lids. Both pillboxes fit snuggly into the holder. The lids stay open and out of the way. It’s just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: HuntosaurusRex

customer_reviews.title: Latches work good, easy to fill.
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this, except for one little thing...the words on the night-time side run backwards. It's hard to explain, but the days are not labelled from Sunday on the left, to Saturday on the right, as we are used to. It's awkward, unlike all the trays we've ever used. If that won't bother you, the quality is great, and the ability to pop the trays out make it very easy to fill.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Folk

customer_reviews.title: Box broke first time we used it
customer_reviews.text: I had the box for a few weeks for traveling purposes and found that the first time I used it the lid to one of the days broke and I could not put it back on. This is an expensive pillbox and I can no longer return it.r
customer_reviews.author: roberto olemberg

customer_reviews.title: Love the size and push button opener
customer_reviews.text: Love the push button openers. Open easily every time. Have a little bigger daily sections than most. Makes it big enough to include medications and supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This the ultimate pill case bar none! Lids pop open, and stay out of the way while you fill the case - imagine that! The lids stay closed until you open them. No spilling of pills! I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: W. Moore

customer_reviews.title: The perfect medication organizer.
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these organizers. I keep one in my car in case I get stuck somewhere. I keep one in case I have to evacuate quickly due to a fire or earhquake. And I use one at home every day. The white and dark purple colors are useful for keeping the morning and evening meds separated. The thumb operated latches keep the compartments from opening if the are bumped. The individual compartments are just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bass

customer_reviews.title: Lettering wore off
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until the lettering wore off and you didn't know what day was which. We tried to remedy it with a sharpie marker and it didn't work very well. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Overpriced POS
customer_reviews.text: I originally wrote a positive review on this product but after using only a 2 months I am finding that this is just an over priced piece of crap. The lettering on the pill box is coming off and I had a lid break off the unit. Paying a premium price for a product should result in getting a premium product. At first glance when you get this product that is what you think you have. After a short period of time you will realize that you have been scammed out of your hard earned money by yet another company. Stick with the dollar store priced pillbox as this one is the same quality as those.
customer_reviews.author: SVEGroup

customer_reviews.title: Great produce!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great! And it holds all the meds the VA is always giving me.
customer_reviews.author: Icedrake

customer_reviews.title: No more loose pockets
customer_reviews.text: Love this critter. So much better than the department store/pharmacy models. Closes tightly, yet opens easily by lever motion. Lid STAYS open when trying to do week's refills. Lid STAYS closed when dumping out neighboring pocket to take daily medicine. Glory be - a product that does what it says with zero aggravations or surprise glitches.
customer_reviews.author: Dandee Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: Roomy but wish it popped out “day by day” vs an entire week
customer_reviews.text: It’s big enough to hold all my vitamins (and I take about 10 pills at a time) but I just wish the compartments lifted out by the day vs a week of daytime and a week of nighttime compartments. When you travel or a day or two, it would be nice to only take the am and pm pills for the days you’re gone vs the whole week of am and pm pills.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Easy to Open and Close Pill Organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pill organizer purchase. I don't know why it starts the week on the right instead of the left, but it does. I really needed one with a 4 times a day dispenser option. My error. I'm ordering one with 4 times a day option to put my health supplements in, and I'll just juggle the two. This one really is an excellent quality and capacity pill organizer if you only two dose per day.
customer_reviews.author: sanne

customer_reviews.title: Great to stay organized
customer_reviews.text: Instead of AM/PM we use this as His/Hers. The size is of each compartment is nice a big and I love the push button to open. You can remove each organizer from the bottom tray, or leave them in there. We stand it up and it's nice and slim. One of the organizers arrived with the days out of order, but it was east enough to pop the lids off and correct it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dmngz

customer_reviews.title: and it is the best. I put 4 smallish pills and one multivitamin ...
customer_reviews.text: This must be the fifth of these pill holders I have tried, and it is the best. I put 4 smallish pills and one multivitamin in the compartments; it could hold a lot more. The doors stay upright when opened which makes for easy loading. I kept the cardboard box for traveling. Haven't tried it yet.
customer_reviews.author: SFfanboy

customer_reviews.title: Large! Easy to open!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! The daily pill spaces are very large! I finally can fit all of my daily vitamins in one day!! The push button tabs to open each day are easy to push. I have arthritis in my hands and I can easily open each day. I like this so much that I bought 4. I plan on buying 4 more for my husband!
customer_reviews.author: KaddyDrafter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: This pill container is perfect for me. It holds pills for AM and PM (which helps me NOT forget to take afternoon and evening pills), the capacity is just right and the spring action on the caps work really well. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Janice R Sampson

customer_reviews.title: High quality but big.
customer_reviews.text: This box doesn't have problem of multiple days opening at once or popping open in a bag. A bit larger than i expected. Too large for a toiletry bag.
customer_reviews.author: MollyRDH

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Ive had several other pill containers and usually they are harder to close, wont stay closed, or when you open 1 slot the other 3 near it pop open. This one works perfectly and is very convenient with its button function along with color coding day and night. Also comes apart pretty easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Bob the budget tech geek

customer_reviews.title: Large compartments and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this when my prior pill organizer got too small (more supplements and huge fish oil capsules). Bought 2 of them so I could have 28 days with once-daily dosing. Very large compartments, easy to fill. Compartments stay closed unless individually opened. Great quality (for plastic) and great value.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Foley

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer!
customer_reviews.text: I use the organizer for my pills. This is my second one. I like being to fill one while using the other this allows me the ability to fill the empty one at a more convenient time. They are easy to fill and use. Highly recommend this product! One is great and two is even greater.
customer_reviews.author: Steve McCoy

customer_reviews.title: It's very sturdy, the best one I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I love this organizer, it's the best one I've ever owned and I've owned quite a few. The other organizers would stay closed or the lids just break off. I rarely write reviews but this organizer deserves its kudos. I highly recommend that you buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Seansmom1

customer_reviews.title: roomy conainers, open and close easily
customer_reviews.text: I used to have two sets of pill boxes for the morning and another for evening, to organize all of my vitamins. This pill organizer is roomy enough I was able to eliminate multiple organizers. The lids open very easily with the push-buttons. I did have to rearrange the lids so they were in order from Sunday to Saturday, but the lids pop off and on easily and this was not a hardship. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: I take  alot of pills man like 2 blue on green a cople white a few  yellow and a colorful one
customer_reviews.text: Its a pill case ! with actuall hinges ! it does seem strong and more durable than a plastic flap molded hinges And it does split AM and PM if you take it out of tray holds alot too Its would actually be good to travel with as it latches well it is big though so I guess it depends on how much you need to carry
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised with how lightweight and cheap the item seemed. Somehow I had thought it was glass but it was mailed in a padded envelope & the original product box was all bent when I opened the envelope. I was surprised it wasn’t broken.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hafer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work properly
customer_reviews.text: The dates are backwards. Meaning they start with Saturday and continue as follows, Friday, Thursday, Wednesday, Tuesday,etc. They can not be rearranged either because they are not individual boxes they are all attached to one another. This is America and we read from left to right, not right to left. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Mello

customer_reviews.title: works well - easy to use for lots of pills
customer_reviews.text: The box operates effectively - all individual day/night containers pop open and closed well. Large size for multiple pills. Would like more color options as I need them for multiple individuals- otherwise perfect so far
customer_reviews.author: Caryn B.

customer_reviews.title: A good reliable pill box.
customer_reviews.text: A great product for a great price. It’s been reliable, easy to use and sturdy. It’s easily dissembled into two parts and also stays sturdy for the two parts together (am and pm). I’ve traveled with it too- all good.
customer_reviews.author: Irit Braginski

customer_reviews.title: Quality Pill Organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality pill organizer. Individual compartments are large enough to hold quite a few pills. The latching and hinge system work very well.
customer_reviews.author: JCM Upstate NY

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction, convenient and safe
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It is way more convenient than similar ones available at drugstores. I especially appreciate the lever method of opening individual compartments, well worth the extra few bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Wordsmith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent snap-top covers for each day
customer_reviews.text: The little covers snap to open and stay open while you fill or retrieve medications. Then when closed the click shut securely. This has eliminated the 2 problems I have had with most cases.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Loveless

customer_reviews.title: BIG Fantastic 7 day pill organizer.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent 7 night and day pill organizer. Keep in mind that this thing is big and can hold several pills for morning and night. Looks and feels well build. Each container's lid is nice and secure when latched closed.
customer_reviews.author: WhollyJoe

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well. One pod can hold up to 12 supplement capsules. Holds 11 very well. The two sides (AM & PM) are removable or you can keep them together in the holder.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Pills Pills and more Pills
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought it would be too big however it is very easy to fill and dispense my meds. One of the times I filled it I dropped it and NONE of the chambers opened so I didn't have pills all over the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: The first pill box I bought did not have a spring tab. You had to push on the day of the week. Lasted a little over a year. It was fine but I like this one better.
customer_reviews.author: CNN

customer_reviews.title: Capacity
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sturdy product designed well and it's what I was looking for. I take a lot of vitamins and they all fit perfectly. A good product. I only had to change the order of the days for the daytime AM supplements which was easy to do. Other than that I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Nora Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Great at home, but delicate if traveling often
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first but after traveling with it in my suitcase twice, two of the doors have broken off. If you aren’t traveling, I would say this is great. If you are, maybe put it in something so the doors don’t pop off?
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Cirillo

customer_reviews.title: Well made and designed
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding product. It is very well made and designed. The compartments never accidentally pop open. This is perfect for travel as well as at home.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Murtz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my weekly doses!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect storage container! Easy to open and close and easy to read. Love the color coating as well. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Bloozier

customer_reviews.title: Best pill organizer period.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality with clever silicon hinges instead of one piece plastic that would wear out. Release buttons with perfect pressure so they don’t pop open by accident.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Well made functional dispenser.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for the supplements I take daily. Replaced a cheap broken plastic hinge container bought at the grocery store. Everything you want, easy press opening, reliable hinge system, removable dispenser from the tray, great price, fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Deerail

customer_reviews.title: Versatile tray, good for travel
customer_reviews.text: This has another advantage over other trays, when it fell to a cement floor, the tray flew apart and the meds stayed safely in their little drawers. We easily snapped it together without crawling around the floor in search of the cintents of the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia W.

customer_reviews.title: Simple, versitile, perfect sized pill dispenser
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one i bought. Very versitile. Bins are big but not too big. Lids are simple and pop up easily. The days can be moved. I like it has two sides which we use for am/pm. And the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Horse

customer_reviews.title: Great design; quality construction
customer_reviews.text: I recently went on a one week trip and this product greatly simplified the process of travelling with and taking my supplements and prescriptions. This organizer is good for a one week trip if you take your meds twice a day, or will work for two weeks if you only need to take them once each day.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. The compartments are large enough to hold ALL of my meds. I love the easy open push tabs too. The color and the design are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Braden

customer_reviews.title: Large durable & sturdy pill organizer
customer_reviews.text: I would classify this as a large sturdy pill holder which is exactly what I was seeking. As someone with large hands it is nice to actually get my fingers into the holder without always having to tip the holder over and risk the pills falling out. Also very sturdy durable construction. This is not a disposable holder. Would definitely order again and recommended to others.
customer_reviews.author: David Penrod

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: These are SO good! They do not open in a purse or in luggage. Large compartments and easy opening!
customer_reviews.author: Gail M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: This just what I needed to hold my meds. and supplements. Ordered another for my brother-in-law. Great product. I am adding to my review that after 2 days use the top of one compartment has broken.I had ordered a second one for brother-in-law. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: joyce fox

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: Love it wish it had locks and comes in a month of pills
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Brady

customer_reviews.title: Best I've bought...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for vacations ~ use them daily and love them!
customer_reviews.author: D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Best weekly pill dispenser I've bought. Been using it a week and have no issues. It's very well built and opens easily, but "locks" well enough that I'm not worried about pills falling out when I toss it in the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best construction we have seen
customer_reviews.text: Love the construction. They have a great hinge design and looks like it well last. Easy one touch open lid
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and easy to fill
customer_reviews.text: I like that when I open the compartments it stays open making it easier to fill every week rather than the ones you can buy at the drugstore
customer_reviews.author: Wbruff

customer_reviews.title: Best need dispenser !
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. Just as advertised. What I find if you have it in a backpack, the lids don't accidentally open up, spilling all your meds out. It is well made, worth every cent!
customer_reviews.author: D. Quenzer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Ok I ended up switching all Of my medication to this because I love the push buttons on this.
customer_reviews.author: Nice6225

customer_reviews.title: This was not very large. We have a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: This was not very large. We have a lot of supplements to take and I purchased them to carry them all. But our pills don’t fit. We should have just stuck with the $1 we spent at the dollar store for a pill case. At least the pills fit. Very disappointing...
customer_reviews.author: Gatanya

customer_reviews.title: Great medicine and vitamin container!
customer_reviews.text: Great holder. I like that the slots are larger to accommodate larger pills. Also I like the push button open for each slot. Never have to worry about other slots opening when you turn it over.
customer_reviews.author: Omega

customer_reviews.title: Great pill box
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mother-in-law and she loves it. Very nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: Nana52

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime Warranty and Service
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice and it has a lifetime warranty and service with good product reviews...thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy useful
customer_reviews.text: Husband ordered these for his meds. They are handy, usefull, big and help him remain compliant. But I did gasp when I saw the price.
customer_reviews.author: MaggieMay

customer_reviews.title: ... buttons on these to open the kids are really easy to operate with aching fingers
customer_reviews.text: The buttons on these to open the kids are really easy to operate with aching fingers. The construction is really solid. This is the nicest pill case I’ve found!
customer_reviews.author: DrowsyKitten

customer_reviews.title: One cannot go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife who balked big time for years. I guess she likes it cuz she uses it daily!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Davis

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It’s great! I don’t take a lot of pills but found I kept for getting some off and on. This prevents that and keeps me on track.
customer_reviews.author: DRRN333

customer_reviews.title: Holds BIG pills!
customer_reviews.text: Great pill organizer! Seems sturdy easy to click open and the pockets hold big pills!!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Watson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this pill holder. Easy to use and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these for my grandmother so i could make up her medicines boxes a month at a time. They are a lifesaver and time saver! I love the hinged lids and the size!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberleen A.

customer_reviews.title: Days of week rub off
customer_reviews.text: Not even a month old and the day-of-week/AM/PM labels have began to rub off! Thought I was getting better than the one I had-nope-it has the same problem. However, the container itself seems good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think there's better out there.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for travel. One of the pill doors has broken off, most of the dates have rubbed off, pretty poor quality. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Trey Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: PILL PUSHERS FRIEND
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for organizing my pills.Sturdy and attractive.I strongly recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BUY WISE

customer_reviews.title: It's a bit large but it is functional.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it were a bit more compact. This is a bit of a lunker for use in travel.
customer_reviews.author: Don M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! No more "Pill spills" as other cases!
customer_reviews.author: n. oliver

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, good capacity
customer_reviews.text: Provides sufficient size for a two-week if used somewhat differently than designed. Compartments open and close with a springy quality. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: p and l

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this -- more expensive, but well-worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these based on the positive reviews. I'm very happy I did! They are such an upgrade from my old one! They are very solidly made, and I really like the silicone "spring" openers. They seem to be very durable -- i don't see how they would ever wear out, because they're silicone pliable material, and it's not folded so tightly as to induce tensile failure. The pill cells are pretty roomy. I take 2 prescription meds, naproxen, plus about 8 supplements -- D3 x2, cinnamon x2, NAC x2, B2 x1, Magnesium x2, CoQ10 x1 -- all of which are sizeable capsules, but there is plenty of room for all of them!
customer_reviews.author: R&J

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Easy for my mother to use and see in organizing her pills for the week.
customer_reviews.author: droughtsurvivor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it really helps me remember to take my vitamins everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Colton & Misty

customer_reviews.title: Awesome - Great for Two People
customer_reviews.text: Great product especially for the price! Finally found a good sturdy one that was large enough to hold our daily vitamins and supplements, which are large and plentiful. Great for sharing one side with your spouse! We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Willis

customer_reviews.title: Great container that does not spill pills.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and easy to open and close. Does not snap open during travel like so many other multi-day pill containers we have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Blaese

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to organize my pills for a week at a time!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Grounds

customer_reviews.title: Great medication organizer!
customer_reviews.text: I manage my parents’ medications every week. These organizers are great! They’re the perfect size for a large amount of pills and they open easy and close easily which is helpful for my elderly parents. They also do not open while transporting which is awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Tblack

customer_reviews.title: Hands down, best pill organizer if you take a lot of supplements
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, best pill organizer if you take a lot of supplements
customer_reviews.author: One

customer_reviews.title: Big, liable to arrive cracked.
customer_reviews.text: Higher volumetric capacity than most. Arrived cracked in several places.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functionality meets awesome design!
customer_reviews.text: This pill organizer is has a good built and definitely helped me improve aspects of my daily routine. I'd definitely buy more of their products in the future!
customer_reviews.author: RyanGaGa

customer_reviews.title: 7-Day 2- Per Day Pill Container
customer_reviews.text: Entire experience and product quality first-class--could not have been better
customer_reviews.author: Edward Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: It is amazing device.
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing device. Now I can organize my drugs for every day for one week. Each separation can contain a lot of drugs. I put ten drugs of big size. My husband is happy too.
customer_reviews.author: lolga

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have so many vitamins that I take and this product fits them all. Big, long, short and small.
customer_reviews.author: watching from the corner of my eye

customer_reviews.title: other than that it’s great. Wish it could be bigger
customer_reviews.text: One of the lids popped off, other than that it’s great. Wish it could be bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Axel Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mom. She loves it! No more spilled pills.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and secure
customer_reviews.text: Very nice medicine box. Love that they flip up and stay up while you are filling them but they close securely. Enough room for all of my pills, which is the most important feature.
customer_reviews.author: S. Back

customer_reviews.title: Labels rub off within a month
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my mom and aunt because the labels on the much less expensive ones that they had used for years had worn off. After just a few weeks of use, labels are disappearing on what I thought would be a better quality product. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Allen White

customer_reviews.title: Why didn’t you slope the side?
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t give this product a five star review because even though it’s solid and the compartment tops spring open nicely.... Because the compartment sides are too straight up. I have two pills that are quite small and I always struggle to get them out of the corners of the compartments. The last container I was using has a slope to the outer side which made it so easy to slide my medication up and out with ease. I don’t know if I will be able to use this container until it wears out before buying a different style because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Platinum Power Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Blantant lack of business ethics.
customer_reviews.text: I find Bexeen to engage in unethical business practices. The do not respond to e-mails nor do they honor their warranty guaranties. Bexeen has been made of a manufaturing defect which causes the lettering on the product to wear off rather quickly however continues to put out the product. I believe Bexeen because of the above reasons has welcomed s Better Business Bureau and Department of Commerce Investigation. What kind of business ethics involves luring, deceiving and ripping off the customers. What is the FDA on your product mean. You are the only pill planner manufacturer and seller I have came across that uses FDA In it’s marketing packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Heck

customer_reviews.title: Stays shut!
customer_reviews.text: I have had several weekly pill boxes that have all failed. The compartment lids stop staying closed after a short time and a bump or fall scatters my meds so I saw this and gave it a shot! It works great ! The compartments stay shut and only open when I push the tab to open. It sure seems more sturdy then the other cheaper ones and didn't really cost that much more. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: SJS in PA

customer_reviews.title: perfect pill organizer with sensible design
customer_reviews.text: Once I switched the lids of the evening pills to read Sunday to Saturday from left to right, I'm perfectly happy with this pill organizer. I like the color coding of the morning and evening pill organizers. The distinct colors prevented me from taking the wrong pills which I was wont to do. It is easy to take the organizers out of the tray and put them back in. I keep them out of the tray except when traveling. That way, it is easier to fill and remove pills. Keeping them in the tray while traveling prevents accidental spills.
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: I would think it better to have them together and then being able to ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have preferred the that this have AM and PM connected together but then able to split up the days. So if I am taking a trip on Wednesday, Thursday and Friday. Then be able to interconnect just these days together. The way this organizer is set up, you can only travel with all 7 day strips. And the AM and PM can be used separately, but who needs that??? I would think it better to have them together and then being able to disconnect the various days. I thought that was what I was getting but evidently I did not read the description properly.
customer_reviews.author: BabyMama45

customer_reviews.title: Helps Organize Your Meds
customer_reviews.text: I've used for three or four weeks and like the product. It gives you a visual if you forgot your meds. I use an app on my iPhone to remind me so basically this simply keeps the meds in one place and easy to access. The headline is misleading. You can easily still miss your meds as this product doesn't put them in your mouth. Just a great organizational tool.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. McBride

customer_reviews.title: Nice design if you only have a few pills per day that you need to store and dispense
customer_reviews.text: These are great for anyone that only has a few pills that they need to take during the course of a day. The buttons, while nice for opening the lids are unfortunately the cause of a problem for me which is that they reduce the size of the cups and make these too small to hold all of my daily supplements and medications which, I have to say, is a deal breaker for me. If these came in an extra large version that would change my three star review to a five.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Love the little silicone strips that make the lids pop up and stay open. Simple, foolproof, effective. Work better than any kind of spring. Can open all the compartments at once and they stay open enough to easily fill. Compartments hold 2 large fish oil capsules, a big multivitamin, two large hair and nail supplements plus several smaller pills. I do store it inside a heavy ziplock bag to avoid losing meds to accidental opening. Hasn’t happened while in the bag. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: DH Walters

customer_reviews.title: The best of this style I have ever owned, for one simple but important reason.
customer_reviews.text: The lids are spring loaded, and stay up when you open them. This means that when you go to refill all the compartments for the week, you don't have to either try to jury rig a way to keep seven at a time open, or even worse, do them one at a time. Note that I've only had this for a week or so, so I can't comment on its long-term durability, but as of right now I will call it far superior to any other I've had, for that one simple and important reason.
customer_reviews.author: W. Cary Kittrell
